amendatorysection.catchline: Corporate name; process; service upon city.
amendatorysection.para: The corporate name of each city of the metropolitan class shall be The City of .................., and all process or notice whatever affecting any such city shall be served in the manner provided for service of a summons in a civil action.

annotation.para: Notice must be in writing and be served on mayor or acting mayor or in their absence from city, upon city clerk. Gordon v. City of Omaha, 77 Neb. 556, 110 N.W. 313 (1906).
